it.unibo.alchemist.boundary.wormhole.interfaces

Interface IPointerVelocityManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NSEPointerVelocityHandler

    public interface IPointerVelocityManager
    Base type for any pointing device: it provides services to analyze the pointer's movement.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point2D getCurrentPosition()
      Gets the pointer's current position.
      Point2D getOldPosition()
      Gets the pointer's old position.
      Point2D getVariation()
      Gets the vector [current position - old position].
      Point2D getVelocity()
      Gets the vector [current position - old position] / elapsed time.
      void setCurrentPosition(Point2D point)
      Sets the pointer's current position and, consequently, updates the old one.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentPosition

        Point2D getCurrentPosition()
        Gets the pointer's current position.
        Returns:
        a Point2D instance representing the pointer's current position

      • getOldPosition

        Point2D getOldPosition()
        Gets the pointer's old position.
        Returns:
        a Point2D instance representing the pointer's old position

      • getVariation

        Point2D getVariation()
        Gets the vector [current position - old position].
        Returns:
        a Point2D instance whose coordinates are [cP.x - oP.x; cP.y - cP.y]

      • getVelocity

        Point2D getVelocity()
        Gets the vector [current position - old position] / elapsed time.
        Returns:
        a Point2D instance whose coordinates are [cP.x - oP.x; cP.y - cP.y] / dt

      • setCurrentPosition

        void setCurrentPosition(Point2D point)
        Sets the pointer's current position and, consequently, updates the old one.
        Parameters:
        point - is the Point2D instance representing the pointer's current position
